metadata.title: CVE-2018-19970 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In phpMyAdmin before 4.8.4, an XSS vulnerability was found in thenavigation tree, where an attacker can deliver a payload to a user througha crafted database/table name.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19970` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

phpmyadmin - 4:4.5.4.1-2ubuntu2.1+esm3
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4:4.5.4.1-2ubuntu2.1+esm3').
